Create a Client

Please fill in this form to create a client

name can not be empty
Length can not be less than 4
Invalid character
Email can not be empty
Please enter a valid email address
Address can not be empty
Mobile can not be empty
Please enter a valid mobile number (only digits are allowed)
Gender
Gender can not be empty
Gender can not be empty
password can not be empty
password should be atleast 8 and max 15 characters long
repeat password is not matching
